meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ernie Sykes Alison Maguire-Powell Rob Liguori Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7481.

td.p: Ernie Sykes, a high school English teacher from Nolensville, Tennessee
Alison Maguire-Powell, a middle school band director from Denton, Texas
Rob Liguori, a research editor from Brooklyn, New York (whose 4-day cash winnings total $72,601)

tr.td: WAR STORIES
STRINGING YOU ALONG
TV SHOWS BY CHARACTER
RUN!
WHO IS OUR LEADER?
A CUTE LITTLE HEDGEHOG
